name: Viking: The Adventure - The best fun free platformer game!
name_original: Viking: The Adventure - The best fun free platformer game!
description:
Jump and run in this unique Viking style platformer through 30 exciting levels!

Explore uncharted lands in a vast hostile Viking world! Choose your deadly weapon and play with one of the 3 characters; Kare, Asta or Einar and collect all the Gold to retrieve your boat!

*** GAMEPLAY ***
- Use the on-screen touch-controls to jump and run
- Jump on enemies to defeat them or use your favorite weapon
- Collect all the gold to clear the level

*** FEATURES ***
- FREE to play
- Action-packed platformer with lots of enemies to defeat
- Awesome graphics
- Beautiful soundtrack
- Choose between 3 great Viking: Kare, Asta and Einar
- Choose between 7 deadly weapons for a real Viking battle!
- Over 30 unique puzzling levels
- Optimized for iPad 2+ and iPhone 5+
